title: Study Spots
description: A list of spots where individuals and groups can go to study

items.description: Details of a single study location on campus at the university

building.description: Building code for the building the room is located in

occupancy.description: Approximate maximum number of people that can study at this location

sound.description: Volume level that the location can be expected to reach

pay_to_stay.description: If true, then a visitor must pay to either enter or remain at this study spot

reserveable.description: If present, then a visitor can reserve a room or booth here. The string should be a set of instructions to reserve a room, or a link to where the user can reserve a room.

groups.description: If true, this location is optimal for groups. Otherwise, this location is better for individuals

computers.description: If true, then computers are available at this location for students to use

outlets.descriptions: Indicates the number of outlets generally available to visitors
